CustomField.formula:
ROUND(8*( (5*FLOOR((TODAY()-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(TODAY()-DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, 24/8*(MOD(NOW()-DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1))) )) - (5*FLOOR((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)-DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, 24/8*(MOD(CreatedDate-DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1))) )) ),
0)
CustomField.label: Case Aging Time
